channel.title: Openice I will join ur server But I need help to get started
channel.description: Hi i have just heard about private servers and I am wondering if some1 could give me a guide start to finish plz i have no idea what to do or were to begin and i have heard i have to download moparscape or watever and wondering do next.....

item.source: Openice I will join ur server But I need help to get started

item.title: Openice I will join ur server But I need help to get started
item.dc:creator: @koolpop0 koolpop0
item.description:
@koolpop0 wrote:

well it all starts with one thing a idea…

1.first get a source google it there arnt many u can buy for free (i got mine free XD)

like:
cheezscape 80
testscape
etc

  1. go to sun.com and get jdk (for running and editing) get jdk1.6.0 or update 1 or 2 they work if u edit compile.bat

3.then go to no-ip.com and sign up for a acc and then go into add on the thing after you sign in on the left
chose a hostname like hellovagoodscape then a end in the drop bar such as .no-ip.biz for the dns typ[e keep it on A
(if you have a router port forward (i do not know how to becuz i dont need to))

4.then to run go in to your source and click runserver.bat then go to join it to see if it works once u join log out then go to moparisthebest.com and click server status and scroll to the botton and click the click here to register your server make sure to put host name and port and details like how kool it is and what it features

5.to edit go in to client.java and change stuff in quotes inless you know what your doing then compile (if there are eny errors u must fix or it wont save so you can make the changes)

tips:

  1. know what your doing if your not changing stuff in quotes
  2. use moparscape for errors they help alot
  3. make me a admin on your server becuz i helped you XD…lol jk

hints:
you need jdk to run and edit!!

extra

make someone a admin:

if you dont have a command for it in your source then you have to do it manuelly. make sure there loged off then go in to charecters folder in your source then click on the file name of the person you want to make admin then go to player rights if they arnt a mod or admin it will show as 0

0 = player
1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner

once you change to what you want save it then have the person log in

Read full topic
